text:
*KlientBoost is hiring a Head of Content* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

KlientBoost is looking for someone to lead content marketing (i.e. no client work). The company recently hit $1 million MRR and is growing fast. You'll have option to work remotely or in Southern CA, Austin or Raleigh.
- You'll write deep posts on CRO, SEO, content, PPC, etc.
- You'll work directly with the founder/CEO [Jonathan Dane](<https://twitter.com/JohnathanDane>)
- You'll get really legit benefits (health insurance, 401k match, gym membership, conference stipend and more)
Check out the [company YouTube channel](<https://www.youtube.com/klientboost>) to see what the culture is like and check out our interview with Jonathan to learn more.


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/22078-head-of-content-klientboost>

<@UJG9WTEKG>
